thread.section_title: Optima Tax Relief Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optima Tax Relief | optimataxrelief.com
thread.title: Sue Finn Stratton
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Sue Finn Stratton

author: Sue Finn Stratton
title: Sue Finn Stratton
text: We are completely satisfied with our service from Optima Tax Relief. The people assigned to our case were very polite and professional. They were eager & ready to answer any questions that we had. The only thing I would have liked more was to have more frequent contact from our representative during the process. I started to wonder how things were moving along when I didn't hear from anyone in awhile. Other than that they were very helpful and instrumental as they used their expertise and knowledge to help us navigate through a stressful situation! We feel that they negotiated the best resolution possible in our situation. Thanks again to our team at Optima Tax Relief!!!
